summary: Email correspondence from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York requesting the wheeling out of an indictment on 'Wheel C' on the morning of July 2, 2020, with an attached unsealing order. The email is forwarded and includes a reference to Katharine Parker.

persons.name: Katharine Parker
persons.role: Sender of original email with unsealing order
persons.context: Appears as the sender of an email containing the unsealing order, which is being forwarded in this correspondence.

events.title: Request to Wheel Out Indictment
events.description: An Assistant United States Attorney requests to have an indictment wheeled out on 'Wheel C' in the morning.

locations: 1 St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: The document is an email dated July 2, 2020, concerning the procedural step of wheeling out an indictment.
It references an attached unsealing order (2020-07-02,_GM,_government_unsealing_request_and_proposed_order.pdf).
The correspondence involves an Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York.
Katharine Parker is identified as the sender of the original email containing the unsealing order.
The email indicates ongoing legal proceedings requiring the unsealing and presentation of an indictment.
